text: Woh momino se pukar pukar kar kahenge kya hum tumhare saath na thay? Momin jawab dengey haan, magar tumne apne aap ko khud fitne mein dala, mauqa parasti ki, shakk mein padey rahey, aur jhooti tawakkuat (expectations) tumhein fareb deti rahi Yahan tak ke Allah ka faisla aa gaya. Aur aakhri waqt tak woh bada dhoke baaz tumhein Allah ke maamle mein dhoka deta raha
